snippet: A range of problems, from a prostrate economy to declining levels of education, have been left to fester and now threaten to undermine the country’s future and even eventual stability.
abstract: Algeria, which some argue could be strategic partner for United States in Middle East, appears to have fallen into state of stagnation and malaise due to its resistance to change; as a result, variety of problems from poor economy to declining levels of education are threatening country's future and eventual stability.
lead_paragraph: A range of problems, from a prostrate economy to declining levels of education, have been left to fester and now threaten to undermine the country’s future and even eventual stability.

headline.main: Politically Adrift, Algeria Clings to Its Old Ways
headline.print_headline: Politically Adrift, Algeria Clings to Its Old Ways

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
